survey1.Question: Hello! I'm Reena from ERC.  I am reaching out to you to have a quick catch up on behalf of the ERC team. This is a regular communication exercise where we reach out to random employees for their feedback on key processes. I will ask you a set of questions, please share your candid feedback.  Can I ask you few questions?
Did you have a check-in recently?  Yes/ No
Do you have a Check-in with your manager Yearly or Quaterly or Monthly or at No set frequency?
Do you and your manager set ongoing expectations for your role?  Yes/ No
Do you have clarity on the performance measures/success metrics  for your role? Yes/ No
Do you receive timely and constructive feedback.  Yes/ No
Do you  have a development plan in place ? Yes/ No

Did you have a learning opportunity in last 12 months. Learning opportunies could mean shadowing, a new assignment or project on the job, attending a training, speaker sessions or taking self paced online trainings etc? Yes/ No
What is the one thing that you think is going very well for you at Adobe?
What is the one thing that is not working well for you at Adobe?
Please share the reason for the above response.
Please share the reason for the above response.
Please share the reason for the above response.
Please share the reason for the above response.
Please share the reason for the above response.
Please share the reason for the above response.
Please share the reason for the above response.
